params:
ctx
centerX
centerY
size
thickness
color

3.text:
x1 = centerX - size
x2 = centerX + size
y1 = centerY - size
y2 = centerY + size
ctx.lineWidth = thickness
ctx.strokeStyle = color
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(x1, centerY)
ctx.lineTo(x2, centerY)
ctx.stroke()
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(centerX, y1)
ctx.lineTo(centerX, y2)
ctx.stroke()
ctx.stroke()

name: drawCross
